availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Leonard Clements Sr. (Union County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Hannah V. Clements. Father of Leonard Clements Jr. Resident in Morganfield, Union County, Kentucky, in 1820. Owned four enslaved persons in Morganfield in 1820. Resident in Union County in 1830. Owned seventeen enslaved persons in Union County in 1830. Resident in Union County in 1840. Owned twenty-nine enslaved persons in Union County in 1840. Farmer in Union County in 1850. Owned five enslaved persons in Union County in 1850. Farmer in Union County in 1860.
